entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning late this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and after midnight. Amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low 10. Forecast issued 10:17 PM PDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain. Temperature steady near 11.
entry.summary: Rain ending early in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:17 PM PDT Thursday 4 May 2023
